titlestmt.titleproper: Rockefeller Foundation records, Field Offices, RG 6
A Guide to the Rockefeller Foundation records, Field Offices, RG 6 FA1613

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-09-12 16:51:26 -0400.

did.unittitle: Rockefeller Foundation records, Field Offices, RG 6

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research with select materials restricted as noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged in subgroups by office. Open subgroups are as follows:
Paris, SG 6.1 (FA395) Brazil, SG 6.2 (FA416) New Delhi, SG 6.7 (FA396) Cali, Colombia , SG 6.9 (FA397) Mexico, SG 6.13 (FA398) Ankara, Turkey, SG 6.19 (FA399)
Within each subgroup records are often further arranged by series primarily by country/geographic area), and subseries (alphabetically, with each assigned letter signifying a subject/program).

An Alphabetical Guide to Country Codes in the Rockefeller Foundation Archives is available at the RAC. This guide details series established in RG 1 (SG 1.1, 1.2, 1.3), RG 2, RG 5 and portions of RG 6 (SG 6.1 and 6.2.).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Records often include administrative and professional correspondence, reports, studies, surveys, and documentation of office or laboratory activites.
